weloveclouds.commons.cli.utils

Class UserOutputWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • weloveclouds.commons.cli.utils.UserOutputWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class UserOutputWriter
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Abstracts the user output target so different output streams can be used.
